name: Lasagna
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: Brown ground beef and boil the noodles. Mix the spaghetti sauce with the browned beef. In a large casserole, put a layer of noodles fol- lowed by a layer of meat and then a layer of cheese. Repeat layers until out of ingredients. Bake at 350Â° for about one hour or until cheese is melted and brown on the edges. Before baking, this dish can also be frozen and baked later. Makes large casserole.
